last_episode_to_air.name: Peak Adulting
last_episode_to_air.overview: An injury forces one camper to cut their climb short. Later, following a tough hike, the winner of the grand prize is revealed.

name: Snowflake Mountain
overview: Hopelessly entitled or simply in need of tough love? Ten spoiled young adults experience nature without a parental safety net in this reality series.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Wilderness
episodes.overview: Ten entitled young adults arrive at what they think is going to be a fancy resort brimming with unfettered luxury. Spoiler alert: It's not.

episodes.name: Ribs Are Ribs?
episodes.overview: A survival skills expert teaches some of the snowflakes how to — gulp — skin a deer while the rest get a crash course in tree chopping.

episodes.name: Last Chance Lake
episodes.overview: Solomon and Deandra are forced to spend the night at... Last Chance Lake. Later, a fire-building challenge splits the snowflakes into teams.

episodes.name: It's Nothing Personal
episodes.overview: A new snowflake brings up the past and tests the group's adaptability. The campers must punch through pieces of wood, but not everyone has the oomph.

episodes.name: If the Hot Tub's Rocking, Don't Come Knocking
episodes.overview: Reeling from a camper's departure, the snowflakes confront their fears by climbing a tree. Randy makes a move on Devon. Matt and Joel inspect the camp.

episodes.name: Playing Chicken
episodes.overview: Two more snowflakes are sent to Last Chance Lake. The campers (theoretically) learn how to be responsible by taking care of chickens.

episodes.name: Call the Medic
episodes.overview: Before attempting to climb up an honest-to-goodness mountain, the remaining snowflakes read messages of encouragement from their loved ones.

episodes.name: Peak Adulting
episodes.overview: An injury forces one camper to cut their climb short. Later, following a tough hike, the winner of the grand prize is revealed.
